"So, Lisa... What should we call you fro: "There's nothing to change. Lisa is still Lisa, so keep calling Lisa Lisa."
"If you want Harriet, just call for her and she'll come right out."
"Lisa is correct, everyone's voices will always reach me."
"However, we are of one body. It may be an inconvenience to Lisa and everyone else, so I ask that you please forgive any trouble it causes."
"...Yeah, it'll definitely take a little while to get used to that."
"Ah, since Harriet is here, I wanted to confirm something."
"How much does the Harriet here know about what happened in Omega?"
"Are you the same Harriet from Omega?"

"...Hehe. I caused a great deal of trouble back
then."
"You may think of me as the same person."
"The Harriet from Omega took over as a god, and came here."
"...I know. It may be easier to imagine it as being similar to Alma's situation."
